snippet.title: Squids Odyssey Launch trailer (America)
snippet.description:
Wii U: http://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/06O7lDzmLOpzcDTpeIdh48BWp8DcGQMy
Nintendo 3DS: Coming soon.
- - -

Squids Odyssey is a unique mix of action strategy and RPG: build your team of Squid heroes for epic turn-based battles against corrupted crabs and shrimps!

Steev and the rest of the Squids are in danger! An infectious black ooze is corrupting their world, and this band of unlikely heroes needs to fight back to save their kingdom! Squids Odyssey is not just about gorgeous cartoon art, jaunty music and humorous storytelling: the battles provide a deep challenge as strategy and skill are required to use the environment, the Squids' strengths and enemies' weaknesses to lead your team to victory!

Recruit a unique team of Squids in four different classes -- shooters, scouts, troopers and healers -- and customize your party with ability-boosting helmets. Battle your way through ancient citadels, exotic coral reefs and Asian temples to save your underwater world -- and if you're after a tougher challenge, dive deep into Pro Mode!

• Fight to save your underwater kingdom in an adventure that mixes action strategy with RPG
• Put together a unique team of Squids and enhance its abilities with barmy helmets
• Win turn-based battles by using the environment to your advantage
• Take on a tougher challenge and push your Squids to the limit in Pro Mode

Release
• Wii U: May 2014
• Nintendo 3DS: coming soon
• Languages: English, French, Spanish, German, Italian

For the latest SQUIDS news, or to ask us a question : Facebook/SquidsTheGame, Facebook/TheGameBakers
Twitter @TheGameBakers

The Game Bakers -- independent game developer
Thegamebakers.com
